title: Chilling History Of Squirrel Cage Jail, Where Anmol Bishnoi Is Lodged
content: Anmol Bishnoi, the younger sibling of gangster Lawrence Bishnoi, was arrested in the US a few days ago for entering that country with illegal documents, sources told NDTV.

title: Oldest Known Human Has Fascinating Secrets Even 50 Years After Discovery
content: Lucy was often described as "the grandmother of humanity", but more recent discoveries suggest she may have been more like an aunt or a cousin, experts say.

title: "Jeff Bezos Was Telling Everyone...": Elon Musk's Claim About Amazon CEO
content: X boss Elon Musk, who is set to take over as co-chair of the proposed Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) in the second Donald Trump administration, has claimed that Amazon head Jeff Bezos had advised people to sell Tesla and SpaceX stocks

title: AI Usage Quickly Broadens From IT To HR And Marketing, Survey Shows
content: About 72% of decision makers reported that generative AI is used at least once a week, up from 37% in 2023, the first year of the survey.
summary: About 72% of decision makers reported that generative AI is used at least once a week, up from 37% in 2023, the first year of the survey.

title: C-A-R-I-C-O-M Spells Out 7 Key Pillars Of India-Caribbean Cooperation: PM Modi
content: Leading the India-Caricom summit as the co-chair, Prime Minister Narendra Modi outlined a seven-pillar programme of action playing on the acronym C-A-R-I-C-O-M.

title: Four Tourists Die After Suspected Laos Methanol Poisoning
content: Four foreign tourists have died after a suspected mass methanol poisoning from drinking tainted alcohol at a backpacker hotspot in Laos, Western government officials and media said Thursday.
summary: Four foreign tourists have died after a suspected mass methanol poisoning from drinking tainted alcohol at a backpacker hotspot in Laos, Western government officials and media said Thursday.

title: K-Drama For Mental Health? Binge On, One Expert Says
content: If you've ever binge-watched an entire season of a K-drama like "Squid Game" or "Crash Landing On You", one Korean-American expert has good news: it's likely improved your mental health.
summary: If you've ever binge-watched an entire season of a K-drama like "Squid Game" or "Crash Landing On You", one Korean-American expert has good news: it's likely improved your mental health.

title: John Prescott, Britain's Former Deputy PM, Dies At 86
content: Britain's former deputy prime minister John Prescott, who served under Tony Blair and helped transform the country's Labour Party, has died aged 86, his family said on Thursday.
summary: Britain's former deputy prime minister John Prescott, who served under Tony Blair and helped transform the country's Labour Party, has died aged 86, his family said on Thursday.

title: Rapper Diddy Wore "Disturbing Smile" As He Raped Male Victim: Report
content: A new lawsuit accusing Sean Diddy' Combs of drugging and raping a man at a Miami house party has been filed in Manhattan. According to the lawsuit, the victim, identified only as "John Doe," was drugged at the event and he lost consciousness.

title: OpenAI CEO Received $76,001 In Pay Last Year, Filing Shows
content: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman received a modest $76,001 in compensation last year, up slightly from $73,546 in 2022, a newly released tax filing shows.

title: US Woman Who Drowned Her 2 Sons In 1994 Denied Parole

title: This Company Uses AI To Tackle Urban Heat In Cities Worldwide

title: North Korea Hackers Behind $42 Million Ethereum Heist Of 2019
content: More than half of the stolen assets were laundered through three crypto exchanges set up by the hackers themselves at a discount to Bitcoin.

title: US Government Calls For Breakup Of Google And Chrome
content: The US government late Wednesday asked a judge to order the dismantling of Google by selling its widely used Chrome browser in a major antitrust crackdown on the internet giant.
summary: The US government late Wednesday asked a judge to order the dismantling of Google by selling its widely used Chrome browser in a major antitrust crackdown on the internet giant.

title: Donald Trump Names Loyalist Matthew Whitaker As NATO Ambassador
content: US President-elect Donald Trump, who has long criticized NATO as overly reliant on American money, on Wednesday nominated loyalist Matthew Whitaker to the crucial post of ambassador to the alliance.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump, who has long criticized NATO as overly reliant on American money, on Wednesday nominated loyalist Matthew Whitaker to the crucial post of ambassador to the alliance.

title: US Police Arrest Man Over Alleged Plot To Bomb New York Stock Exchange
content: US police on Wednesday arrested a homeless man suspected of plotting to bomb the New York Stock Exchange this week after he shared his plans with undercover officers, according to a court filing.
summary: US police on Wednesday arrested a homeless man suspected of plotting to bomb the New York Stock Exchange this week after he shared his plans with undercover officers, according to a court filing.

title: US Explains Why It Supplied Landmines To Ukraine In Big Policy Shift
content: The US decision to send anti-personnel landmines to Ukraine -- a major policy shift slammed by rights groups -- was triggered by a change in Russian battlefield tactics favoring infantry over mechanized units.
summary: The US decision to send anti-personnel landmines to Ukraine -- a major policy shift slammed by rights groups -- was triggered by a change in Russian battlefield tactics favoring infantry over mechanized units.
